title: Ep 157: Keeping Up with Mariah Smith
itunes:title: Ep 157: Keeping Up with Mariah Smith
itunes:subtitle: Kate prepares for a work deadline by settling in for a RomCom marathon and Doree bakes some challah bread after catching her husband’s not-so-subtle hints that he misses it. Then, Mariah Smith (Spectacle) dishes on which reality tv show is the best rea...
description:
Kate prepares for a work deadline by settling in for a RomCom marathon and Doree bakes some challah bread after catching her husband’s not-so-subtle hints that he misses it. Then, Mariah Smith (Spectacle) dishes on which reality tv show is the best reality show of our time, which Kardashian-Jenner beauty products you should avoid, and how she stays close to her sisters during the pandemic. 


Click here to shop all of Forever35's Amazon recs.

 

To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).
